name: Sam Law in the Revenge of the Ape Who Shall Not Be Named
name_original: Sam Law in the Revenge of the Ape Who Shall Not Be Named
description:
A short adventure game made about a long-dead joke. Fully voiced dialog, featuring the vocal talents of:

  • Conro "I would rather not have my real name in the credits" Norock
  • Jonathan Cusdan
  • James Rankin
  • Bradley Schulze
  • Michael Martin
  • Yukon Wainczak
  • Chloe Tibets
